alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GOVE COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Gove, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Gove County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Kansas.
